items.headline: Chevron, Exxon profits keep falling, but beat expectations as production hits records
items.summary_en: Falling oil prices continued to hurt earnings for both Chevron and Exxon Mobil, but both oil giants managed to beat Wall Street’s profit expectations

items.headline: Will Palantir follow Netflix with a stock split of its own?
